div.p:
Curia gilde huius burgi tenta per Johannem de fife prepositum xxjmo die octobris Anno
Domini et cetera xlvjto /

Quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Communes consiliarios
huius burgi pro anno presente
Johannes vaus
Ricardus Ruthirfurd'
a Gilbertus meignes
Johannes de scrogs pater
Johannes de marr' Junior
a Thomas craufurd'
a Andreas culane
Andreas ayncroft
Johannes gray
Johannes culane
Alexander Kintor
Ricardus de camera
Willelmus scherar'
Robertus blyndseil
thomas blyndseil
matheus fichet
Stephanus Johnson'
John' voket
patricius badenach'
Simon blabre
Robertus de camera
Johannes henrison' culane
Walterus giffard
Ricardus Kintor
Thomas Kintor

Item ob fauorem domini Comitis de craufurd' consilium concessit Andree And Alaneson'
hospiti eiusdem primam vacaturam aquarum huius burgi que proximo vacauerit / quam idem
Andreas optare voluerit et cetera

xvjto die mensis februarii Anno Domini supradicto / ex deliberacione communis Consilij et partis
gilde concesse sunt quatuor libre vsualis monete ad supportacionem et relevacionem
magistri Andree croudane nati confratris gilde huius burgi / pro labore suo circa
predicacionem et doctrinam populi huius burgi / et hoc durante voluntate consilij
supradictj

It is to remembir' that on' the ix day of August Andrw
scherrar' put hym in the Aldirmannis wyll' for forstallyn
of wll' hid and skyn' and oblisit tyll' ourtak his entent
apon' the qwilk the said Andrw has fundyn' John Wod
borch til entir on the nest fryday hereftir and to stand
to the ordenanss' of the commown' consall'

The actione movit betuix gilbert mason' and gib bowman of bamf anent the lottyn
of the said' gib bowmannis gudis castine be the awintour' of se is put
to the declaracione of Johne' of marr' Duncane of clat patrik of badenache
and Johne' howyson' to thaim that thai will take to thaim till ende it gif
thai kane and gif they kane nocht to be at the law agayn ilke man at thair'
awantage
Confratres gilde tempore Johannis de fyff

Andreas red dominus de badfothall' receptus est in liberum burgensem et conffratrem
gilde racione paterne libertatis v s'

Alexander de Wldny receptus est in liberum burgenssem et confratrem gilde ad instanciam
diuersorum vicinorum et datus Waltero Dw in subsidium suum

Adam of spens tinctor ad instanciam mariote de ruthirford receptus est
in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde xl s'

Johannes bwllok ad instanciam episcopi rossensis et aliorum diuersorum vicinorum
receptus est in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde pro vino
Conffratres gilde tempore prepositure Johannis de Fife

Duncanus Alawne' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi pro
quibus soluet quinque marcas plegio

Andreas de fyfe receptus est in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ad instanciam diuersorum vicinorum
et cetera

Johannes Redde litstar' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ad instanciam
Johannis Waus' pro quadraginta s' plegio

Andreas geoffray receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ad instanciam diuersorum
vicinorum pro quadraginta s' plegio

Georgius adamson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi pro
quinque s'

Alexander Johannes rolland receptus est in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ad instanciam
magistri walteri seneschalli et rectorem rectoris de kyncardyn et vi eciam ad instanciam vicarii nostri pro vino

Johannes parfite receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ad instanciam Duncani
de clat balliui et domini de forbes pro xlta s'

Johannes gillespy receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi ad
instanciam Johannis de marr' et domini de gordone' pro xlta s'

Johannes mathyson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi ad
instanciam dicti Johannis de marr' et domini de gordon' et domini de forbes pro xlta s'

Walterus de achneve receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
ad instanciam Johannis scrogis patris pro xlta s'

Willelmus cwmyn' receptus est in liberum burgensem et
confratrem gilde ad instanciam diuersorum consanguenium suorum
et remanebit in villa et habebit terram infra annum et diem
et cetera pro xl s' plegio

Walterus mudy receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ad instanciam Alexandri
de Douglas
Willelmus petri receptus fuit / in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi pro xl s' plegio
Burgenses tantum tempore Johannis fyff prepositi

Johannes stokar' receptus est in leberum burgensem prestito
solito iuramento et soluet pro xx s' plegio

Johannes smyth filius Willelmum receptus est liberum burgensem
istius burgi prestito solito iuramento propter reuerenciam beati
nicolaij et pro factura operis beati nicolaij

Johannes talyour receptus est in liberum burgenssem' prestito
solito iuramento et soluet xiij s' et iiij d'
Summa pecunie tam fratrum gilde quam burgensium xxiij lib' x s'

The xij day of the moneth' of August the yer' et cetera xlvij the aldirman and the bailyeis tuk law
borowis of Johne' cheyne of essilmunde and of Williame cheyne his son' that is to say that
Johne' cheyne has fundyne Johne' Wode law borche to comper' apon' vj dayis warnyng
befor ws to the instans of sere alexander of Irwyne for the hurtyng and distrobillance of his
man Johne' Donaldson' and of the toune'

Item Willame cheyne his son' has fundyn Androw rede of badfothale and Johne' Kymdy
law borowis for him to comper' apon' vj dayis warnyng befor the aldirman and bailyeis that
sall be for the tyme to the instans of sere alexander of Irwyne lorde of Drum for the hurtyne
of his man Johne' Donaldson' and for distroblance done' in the toune' and til vndirly the law thar
apon'

Item poactone' marschale and thome robertson has findin John Wode law borch to entir apon'
vj dayis warnyng befor ws and til vndirly law in like maner as of befor'

Item Johne' cheyne is cummyne borch be his hande and his lande oblist tharto in presens
of the aldirman and bailyeis til Androw rede and to Johne' Kymdy to kepe thaim scathles
of the borowgang that thai ar becummyne for Willame cheyne his son'

Item the parteis ar oblist in presens of the aldirman and the bailyeis that thai sall comper' befor'
ws bot honestly and with na lordschipe na rowtis bot humly and mekely til vndirly
the law

Curia Gilde huius burgi tenta per Willelmum Scherar' prepositum sexto die
mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quadragesimoseptimo .

Quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Communes Consiliarios huius burgi de anno presenti
Johannes defife
Johannes vaus
Gilbertus meignes
a Ricardus Ruthirfurde
a Johannes de marr'
Johannes scrogs pater
a thomas craufurde
Andreas ayncroft
a Robertus blyndseil
patricius badenach'
a Ricardus Kintor
Alexander Douglas
Matheus fichet
a Johannes voket pater
a Andreas culane
Stephanus balrony
a Johannes scrogs filius
a Duncanus clat
Alexander Kintor
a Thomas blyndseil
a Simon blabre
Johannes henrison' culane
Johannes howison'
Ricardus de camera
macolmus forbes
Johannes kynnynmond'
John' blak
a Dauid Ruthirfurd'
Johannes Kintor
Willelmus voket
Andreas alaneson'
Willelmus cadiou
a Andreas meignes
a Dauid meignes
Walterus giffard'
Robertus de camera
Willelmus Rolland'
Alexander blyndseil
a Johannes Stephynson'
Willelmus Wodman

Item the sammyn dai the said Counsaile has consentit and Concludit that
alsweil the feit chaplaynis and the feft chaplaynis sal be Rewlit and
governyt / and trespassouris correct be the sight' of the Aldirman and counsaile
forsaid / or ellis the agaynstandaris of this statute sal noght' be maynetenyt
be the maistires et cetera

div.head: Nomina auditorum Computorum magistrorum fabrice ecclesie
div.p:
Ricardus Ruthirfurd' Alex A Johannes vaus / Matheus fichet Stephanus Johnson'
Johannes gray / Gilbertus meignes / patricius badenach' Johannes scrogs pater et
Johannes howison' Johannes marr'

Et precepitur Johanni fife magistro fabrice ecclesie quod presentet computum suum in
scriptis eisdem auditoribus citra festum beati martini proximo futuro
Item quod presentet computum suum officij sui prepositure infra xl d' dies

Item it is concludit and ordanit be the said Counsaile that the Aldirman sal
conclude na thing belangyng the Communitee of the toune / but counsaile
and assistance of xij persounes at the leste of the said Counsaile eftir
the tenour' of the acte made thar'apon of before

Item the sammyn dai be avis' of the said Counsaile the secrete Seel is was
deliuerit in keping / to John' gray to be Seelit with' the Aldirmannys Seel
in a purs'
Curia gilde tenta xxmo die mensis octobris Anno Domini supradicto

The sammyn dai the commoune counsaile avisit ordanit and confermyt
the actis and statutis made of befor apon forstallaris / that is to say
that naman freman na othir' forstall woll in the cuntreth' vndir the
payne of v markis to the commoune vs' / for ilke sek that he bijs
And quhasa forstallis skynnis als oft xiij s' iiij d'
And al quhasa forstallis hidis alsoft as it be taynt xx s'

Alsua that naman of this burgh' tak othir' mennys monay in this
fredome to waar' vndir payne of x lib' vnforgiffin / as is contenit
in the actis made thar'apon of befor / xv yheris syne

Item that the balyheis keip the assise of brede / and stanche cakbariscakbakaris
and spillaris of the merkate / and punys' thaim as law and statutis
will
Item that na ale be sald derar' that than vj d' and iiij d' the galoune

The xxiiij dai of octobre / the yher' of grace et cetera xlvij / The hale
counsaile Ripely avisit has fundin and concludit / that John' of fife
for a quartar' John' the vaus for a quartar / Gilbert meignes for a quartar / and
John' blyndseil and thom blyndseil and Adam hill' for a quartar sal
ansuer' and Red the toune of the det aucht to thomas bernwale
of londone / and sal freith' and bryng hame the commoune seel
and content the nyghboris' of the toune / that thair' gudes warr'
tane thar'for / and allowit be bernwale / And the Aldirman sal
tak souertee of the said persounes that thai sal content the thing
that awyng to the nyghboris' of the toune betuex this pasch'
next tocum / and thai sal deliuer the Remanant that is acht' to
bernwale fo to four' lele men to be chosin be the Aldirman to be
kepit to bernwall' availe / and that be the sammyn tyme

Item the Aldirman sal gerr' the persounes that has commission to set
the wattires deliuer In / the thing that thai haue done eftir
as thai warr' ordanit

The ferd day of Nouembre / the yher' forsaid the counsaile has chosin
as commissaris to pass' with' commissioune til Edynburgh' / that is to say
the Aldirman Williame scherar' Gilbert meignes and mathew fichet
and to tak thair' Resonable expens' of the next martynmes' maalez

Item the sammyn dai Dauid meignes present a letter of Requeste of the Erle
of Huntleys makand mensioune that Androw tulidef had promissit him to
assigne his wattir of the pott a til a frend of his quhom that like
him / and requirand the Ad Aldirman and Counsaile to admyt Dauid
meignes forsaid to the said wattir / the quhilk oblisyng oblisyng
give the forsaid Androw has made to the lo lord or give it be
vacand at the disposicioune of the toune / the counsaile except
certane persounes has grauntit the said wattir to the forsaid
Dauid / the quhilk sal remayne vngiffin owte to the cummyng
of the said Androu of tulydef / And this the hale counsaile
has grauntit

Item the sammyn dai the hale counsaile than beand present to the noumbre
of xxiiij persounes has concludit ordanit and statute / that fra
hyne furth' nan na nyghbor' of this burgh' / sal purchas or bryng
Request of ony lordis for ony takis of this toune / and quhasa
dois he sal tyne his fredome and al othiris takis that he has of
this toune / and als the Requestis sal noght' behal behard na
favourit
